solution_line_template: Her pizza has {total_slices} slices and she ate 1/2 of the pizza for lunch so that leaves {total_slices}/{lunch_divisor} = <<{total_slices}/{lunch_divisor}={slices_after_lunch}>>{slices_after_lunch} slices left
She eats {dinner_fraction} of the pizza for dinner, so she eats {dinner_fraction}*{slices_after_lunch} = <<{dinner_fraction}*{slices_after_lunch}={dinner_slices}>>{dinner_slices} slices

She had {slices_after_lunch} slices and ate {dinner_slices} slices, so that leaves her with {slices_after_lunch}-{dinner_slices} = <<{slices_after_lunch}-{dinner_slices}={slices_for_tomorrow}>>{slices_for_tomorrow} slices for tomorrow's lunch
